Params: {3: 'Endless infected test subjects swarm out from all directions. Two of them, surrounded in the center, look like waves in a black ocean.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Alpha cuts a test subject in half with her dagger, then spins her hilt in a crescent to knock away another enemy approaching from her back.'}
{3: 'The test subject is thrown into the air and frozen by a chilling tornado. It falls to the ground and shatters.'}
{3: 'As Lucia pulls back her thruster to block a frontal attack, one test subject crawls to the ceiling and descends upon her.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia senses the danger and wants to move to the side, but another test subject grabs her blade.'}
{3: 'She is halted for a split second, but the falling attack is imminent. A thunderous clap strikes over her head, leaving behind the pungent odor of ozone.'}
{3: 'As the threat above her disappears, Lucia slashes apart the test subject grabbing her weapon and falls back.'}
{3: 'Seeing their retreat, the test subjects halt their attack, as if they are thinking of a solution.'}
{3: 'Although their actions are still swift, both of them have an imperceptible fatigue in their tone.'}
{3: 'While facing enemies from all directions, they still have to focus more on suppressing the noises in their M.I.N.D.'}
{3: 'The test subjects seem to have noticed their exhaustion. They begin to swarm over again after staring at them for only a brief moment.'}
{3: "Lucia's thruster deflects the attack of several Corrupted like a shield. A crimson katana then cuts them in half."}
{3: "Lightning dances on the test subjects' dark bodies, stunning them briefly. Within the next instant, a blade swipes over and destroys their central system with precision."}
{3: 'The light of the two blades mirrors each other, forming a perfect circle.'}
{3: 'Wave after wave, dark tides charge at them, only to be reduced into foam, unable to shake the rock at the center.'}
{3: 'Still, the rock is gradually collapsing inside.'}
{3: "They do not need to ask to sense each other's condition."}
{3: 'The seemingly endless battle is wearing them down. The screeching noise deep in their M.I.N.D. is getting increasingly clear, to the point that their actions are being hampered.'}
{3: "One short sentence is enough for them to understand each other's intentions."}
{3: 'Their tactics were already incredibly similar to begin with. The brief cooperation has created an impressive level of synergy.'}
{3: 'â€”That they will give up the passive defense and eliminate all the enemies with one charged-up strike.'}
{3: 'Lightning strikes a large area near them, creating a short window for Lucia.'}
{1: '1', 3: "The airflow from the thruster's tail is sending the hem of the duo's outfit flying. Holding tight onto the thruster, Lucia rises to midair."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Meanwhile, Alpha puts her blade back into the sheath and steps on the katana that Lucia had stuck into the ground. With a strong push, she has reached the same height.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Charged to the limit, Lucia hurls a frost attack toward the ground, freezing all the test subjects below.'}
{3: "The indicators on Alpha's blade sheath light up one after another. As she draws the blade at an imperceptible speed, everyone is blinded by the dazzling lightning."}
{3: 'When two of them fall to the ground, their vision has been restored.'}
{3: 'The ground around them is full of scorched black marks from the lightning strikes. All the test subjects lie on the ground lifelessly, becoming part of the scorched earth.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia pulls her katana out from the ground, trying to calm her simulated breathing.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Alpha also sheathes her blade after confirming there are no enemies in sight.'}
{3: 'Before Alpha could finish, they heard a horrifying noise underneath the trembling ground.'}
{3: 'The feeling of weightlessness soon arrives. The ground was already on the brink of collapse. Their charged-up attack became the final straw.'}
{3: "The depth below is a lot greater than the room's height. Even Constructs have a high chance of injury if they fall directly to the bottom."}
{3: 'Even if they are lucky to land unscathed, they still need to watch out for falling rocks.'}
{3: 'As Alpha searches around for stepping places, she suddenly feels a drop in the nearby temperature. A hand reaches out to her.'}
{3: 'The thruster can hardly carry two Constructs. Lucia freezes the falling rocks and barely connects them into a track.'}
{3: 'Following Lucia, Alpha also steps onto the icy track. She deflects the incoming rocks with her hilt as Lucia continues to make the track.'}
{3: 'Soon, they can feel solid ground under their feet.'}
{3: "Lucia's thruster is already covered in frost. She puts it away and inspects the unfamiliar environment."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I can't find this basement in the previous records.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "This place is a secret even to Kurono's own staff.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Luna was here before she was transferred.', 4: '1'}
